text: Is there a convenient method for getting component extrema from `EnsembleSolutions` ?

text: that works, but only if each trajectory has the same number of time elements. Its not a big deal. Just wonderered if that was something I was missing in EnsembleAnalysis. Its nice to get the extrema for ensembles when animating
